CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Day__c, "Monday"), "Monday ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Day__c, "Tuesday"), "Tuesday ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Day__c, "Wednesday"), "Wednesday ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Day__c, "Thursday"), "Thursday ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Day__c, "Friday"), "Friday ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Day__c, "Saturday"), "Saturday ", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Day__c, "Sunday"), "Sunday ", NULL) + TEXT(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_Start_Time__c) + ' - ' + TEXT(CH_Workgroup_Schedule_Timeslot__r.CH_End_Time__c)
CustomField.label: Timeslot Info
